title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 6, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 6, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark reconnect to talk about an opinion out of the Supreme Court that caught Mark's attention and they discuss the Bill Cosby situation and what may be to come in that case. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
